card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Emergency Typhoon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Draw up to 2 cards. Then discard a card from your hand.

card.name: Auzesu, Demonic Elemental
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Sympathy ■ Whenever one of your Angel Commands or Demon Commands attacks, destroy one of your opponent's tapped creatures. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Heaven's Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand to the battle zone.

card.name: Bega, Vizier of Shadow
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Then discard a card at random from your opponent's hand.

card.name: Ashliger, Holy Dark Beast
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Your Angel Commands and your Demon Commands may cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Aquan Jr.'s Delivery
card.text: ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all light and darkness cards from among them into your hand, and put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Bone Dance Charger
card.text: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Charger

card.name: Wedding Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution, non-light Angel Command creatures from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Heaven's Double Tail
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. If you have an Angel Command in the battle zone, you may choose both: :► Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them. :► Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

card.name: Wagahai Cat, Destiny Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add one of your non-evolution Commands in the battle zone to your shields face down. If you do, your opponent adds one of their Commands in the battle zone to their shields face down.

card.name: Kibbate Cat, Heaven's Gate Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may take a card that has "Heaven's" in its name from your deck, show that card to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Codenight Star in the Love
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy all other creatures. If you do, put all your shields into your graveyard. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Trueangel Leo the Star
card.text: ■ Evolution―Put on one of your Angel Commands. ■ Blocker ■ Triple Breaker ■ Whenever your other Angel Commands would leave the battle zone, they stay in the battle zone instead.

card.name: Truename Baulion
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return up to 2 spells from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Heaven's Cube
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Search your deck. You may take a spell from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Chulal Reis, Black Tie of Heaven Descent
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, draw 2 cards.
